trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect sync customization options | Microsoft Azure
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect sync customization options | Microsoft Azure

trans-unit.source: Explains how to customize Azure AD Connect sync.
trans-unit.target: Explains how to customize Azure AD Connect sync.

trans-unit.source: Azure AD Connect sync: Customizing Synchronization options
trans-unit.target: Azure AD Connect sync: Customizing Synchronization options

trans-unit.source: The Azure Active Directory Connect synchronization services (Azure AD Connect sync) is a main component of Azure AD Connect that takes care of all the operations that are related to synchronizing identity data between your on-premises environment and Azure AD in the cloud.
trans-unit.target: The Azure Active Directory Connect synchronization services (Azure AD Connect sync) is a main component of Azure AD Connect that takes care of all the operations that are related to synchronizing identity data between your on-premises environment and Azure AD in the cloud.

trans-unit.source: From a synchronization perspective, Azure AD Connect sync is the successor of DirSync, Azure AD Sync and Forefront Identity Manager with the Azure Active Directory Connector configured.
trans-unit.target: From a synchronization perspective, Azure AD Connect sync is the successor of DirSync, Azure AD Sync and Forefront Identity Manager with the Azure Active Directory Connector configured.

trans-unit.source: <html></html><linkText>Azure AD Connect sync</linkText>
trans-unit.target: <html></html><linkText>Azure AD Connect sync</linkText>

trans-unit.source: The objective of this topic is to provide you with links to topics that are related to Auzre AD Connect sync.
trans-unit.target: The objective of this topic is to provide you with links to topics that are related to Auzre AD Connect sync.
